content.detailedDescription: It was 6 am on a job site and while talking with an employee from the corner of my eye i saw a light shoot from one cloud to another cloud and never reappear.  my employee asked me if i saw it and i told him i had.  he saw it very clearly and described a dark triangular shaped object with three very bright green lights that also projected pinkish beams from the rear of the object.  there was a white aura around the front like it was pushing the atmosphere with its extremely high rate of speed. my employee was shaking for several minutes afterwards.  i had another employee 300' away and after he approached us and heard us talking about it confirmed what we had seen by telling us he saw the same thing.  he was not going to say anything about it to us until he knew we had seen it as well.
content.summary: We witnessed a triangular object with green lights exit a cloud and shoot upwards into another cloud and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: I open my front door as i was talking to my mom on the cell.. looked up at wht i thought was a ballon .. i didnt pay too much attn at first but the i saw it do a figure 8.Then went into a cloud wich was slowly moving.. the object was following the cloud bilike hiding..It would go out of the cloud ..And back i side.. it was shiny.. silver .. like and at times apeard to be dark.. sich also cought my attention.. i called my wife outside.. she stared at it for like a min.. then we lookd and she said .. ill get the cell.. and started recording with her samsung galaxy3.. for a wile it dod the same thing.. and then went to s sttait flight path into the distance till we xould not see it.  then was gone.. immediately i called the san berdino airport..@909 382 4100. askd the lady to tranfer me to watch tower.. i hadto know if they saw it..Or it had to be seen.. but was left on hold .. then i explaind wht i saa to a lady again .. then she hung up on me..   this was not a drome of anykind.. and would not move so quikly.. not toy like !!! object frm far away apeard to be atleast 2 car lenths...   .. to whom it may concern.. al morales
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Talking on the cell when looked up and saw sht i thought was a ballon..The itsent into a cloud it did a figure 8. up sown hoverd.. and went east.. i called my sife and recorded some of it but very hard to see from the bideo..

content.detailedDescription: I was working as a flight attendant on a flight from denver to pittsburg and when we were over ohio a large craft was identified by other airplanes asking atc to pick it up on their radar. atc could not see it, the captain announced over the pa to look out the right side of the airplane to see a ufo. it was huge and above us with red blue lights. the exact date and year is vague but i do remember it was in the mid 80's and there was a pittsburg journalist on board who took notes from the event and interviewed the captain. i also went to the cockpit to listen to the radio traffic and all the airlines were seeing it and commenting. it was keeping a straight line and was bigger than a modern airliner, much much bigger and the from was unknown, it was just very big. the event happened at night with no moon light and other than the light from our own airplane and the lights off the ufo was the only source of illumination at the time. i was not the only one who saw it, everyone on board saw it and people on the ground saw it. it was reported in the paper the next day as space junk entering the atmosphere. i do not believe this, it was keeping a straight line without any glowing matter of any kind except the blueish lights. it appeared to be a craft of some kind.
content.summary: Very large above the boeing 737 i was in radio traffic contacted atc to id, news next day stated satelite entering atmosphere,

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend showed me where she grew up in douglas city ca, on google earth. the street is riverview drive,in douglas city, ca. and right there on google earth, somewhat above her house are 2 objects, 1 of which looks to be a ufo, the other, a black, multi faceted object, may be some sort of stamp that google earth uses. check it out before they remove it!!!
content.summary: 2 ufos can be seen at described location on google earth

content.detailedDescription: This event occurred at about 1:10 am on march 14, 1997, about 18 miles southwest of tucson, arzona. at that time i was a 42 year old electronic engineer who operated a small home business, doing contract jobs for various clients. i had lived in tucson for some time, and felt that the city was too noisy for me to concentrate on my work. i wanted to live in a quiet rural area where i would not be disturbed, and in 1996 i purchased a house in a sparsly populated area southwest of town. i had a neighbor across the road from me, and there was an unoccupied house furthur to the north. my property extended about 100 feet from the front of the house, and then there was a barbed wire fence. it had 5 wires, the top one being about 4 feet high. it was usually quite dark at night out there, however i had installed some floodlights on the front of the house, which i could turn on if needed. i went to bed around 10 pm, march 13, and was sleeping soundly when the event began. i was awakened around 1:10 am, march 14 by the sound of someone attempting to open the bedroom window, about 6 feet away from me. the sound was like nails on a blackboard. the window was on the front of the house, and consisted of double-pane glass with track-locks on it, and a set of blinds which were closed. although i could not see who was trying to get in, i had a profound feeling of being in mortal danger... as if whoever was outside meant to do something terrible to me. i've always had a good sensitivity to the feelings of people and animals, and i was confident that what i felt was genuine. as quickly as i could, i rolled out of bed, away from the direction of the window, and grabbed a 12 gauge shotgun from the closet. at this time my emotions changed from fear to intense anger and a strong determination to kill the attempted intruder, if he got in. i pumped a shell into the chamber, which made an audiable noise, then ran to the living room window, which was only about 10 feet from the bedroom window, also on the front of the house. that was where the switch for the floodlights was located. i hit the switch, and was totally shocked when i saw this thing, which was now moving away from the house towards the fence. i got a pretty good look at the back of it, for about 5 seconds. it was definitely not human. it was about 6-7 feet tall and had a large head, similar in shape to a football helmet. it was very thin and the arms were quite long. it wasn't exactly running, but it was moving smoothly and very quickly. it reached the fence in just a few seconds, and then, without slowing down, it jumped right over the fence like a hurdle jumper in the olympics, and kept on going. it continued down to the wooded area where the unoccupied house was, and within about 30 seconds i saw a disk shaped object rise up from there, and move off towards the south. it was about 40 feet in diameter and passed by the front of my house at a distance of about 130 feet, about 60 feet above the ground. it had steady yellow-redish lights on the bottom of it and made no sound that i could hear. my state of mind collapsed into total shock and an overwhelming feeling of fear. all i could think of was what might happen if it came back. i spent the rest of the night virtually paralysed with fear, hiding behind a couch in the living room, clutching the shotgun. when the sun began to come up, i started to regain some of my senses. i carefully went outside and looked around. everything seemed normal, except that by my bedroom window i found some footprints. there hadn't been much rain and the ground was rather hard, but a few of the impressions were fairly clear. the prints were about 10-11 inches in length, very thin, and with 3 large toes. i should have photographed them, but at the time my only concern was my own safety, and i decided to go to a hardware store and get some bolt locks to secure the doors. this i did, and on the way back i stopped at a small cafe a few miles from my house, to pick up some coffee and breakfast. i entered the cafe, ordered some food, and then noticed that a casual friend of mine was there. he lived in a trailer a few miles to the south of me. when i saw him i simply said "man, something really weird happened last night" and he replied "you're not kidding... a ufo came up the canyon". i was startled to hear that, and asked him "what time ?" and he replied "about a quarter past 1". when he said that i panicked and left the cafe without even taking my coffee or food. (some months later i actually tried to find him, to ask him for some details, but i was told he had left the area back in march...) anyway, i returned to the house and installed the locks on the doors. the following day i went into town and purchased a bunch of heavy plywood, and boarded up every window in the house. i didn't have a television and didn't happen to catch any reports about the so-called "phoenix lights" until several years later. as to reporting the incident, i considered it but was doing some military contract jobs and was afraid that i might be typed as a lunatic or a security risk and lose my clearance... and in addition i simply had no desire to talk about it. the whole thing was just too disturbing. eventually i moved away from that area, and although it's been a number of years since it happened, i'm only recently feeling able to talk about it.
content.summary: Entity attempted to enter house, was driven off, apparently returned to ufo and departed

content.detailedDescription:
On my drive home from work at washington dulles intl. airport i witnessed a light that was very low in the sky. i had just gotten off of the rt.28s - rt.66 front royal (westbound) exit just prior to passing under the highway sign for exit 52 centreville when i noted a rather large red, slowly pulsating orb of light that was quite low and moving west-southwest bound passing from over the highway and to the right. as i proceeded westbound i was very aware of the object and noted it's irregularities compared to what i'm familiar with seeing in regards to aircraft and airliners. i was first alerted to it's peculiar nature due to that fact that it was too low to be on the approach path to kiad's runways 01l/c/r. the lowest altitude an aircraft can be south of kiad enroute to runways 01l/c/r is from 2,900'-2,300' from 7.7 - 5.8nm and this object was just about 300' higher than the treetops in that particular area. additionally i mentally assessed the objects features and noted that the only visible light was the aforementioned slowly pulsating red light orb. all aircraft are required to have minimum external navigation lights operable before flying at night, these include red and green wingtip navigation lights, white steady burning position lights, amber/red burning quick/moderate flashing beacon lights on the ventral and dorsal portions of the fuselage. this object wouldn't have been legal to have flown or even be dispatched given its singular large centrally located red light. as i drove closer to it i slowed down and craned my head to get a better look at it, noticing that the red light was very clearly reflecting off of the bottom of the object. i noted that the surface of the object had none of the familiar features i know aircraft and airliners posses, instead it was flat with a very black and matte like surface that only just reflected the very edges of the red light in a manner not like that of aircraft grade aluminum. in addition to slowing down i also had put my drivers side window down to listen to it and to my surprise i heard no noise that an object that low and of that size would make. the objects speed was also quite slow such that i was able to rule out that it wasn't an airliner, corporate jet, ga aircraft or even a helicopter. i've been driving this route for 5 days a week for the past 6 years and am quite familiar with my environment but this was a very out of place observation. in addition i am a pilot who holds several licenses including a commercial pilots license and an aviation teaching license. i work for a major airline and am more than familiar with general aviation, military aviation and commercial aviation having been in the industry since i was 15 y/o.

after arriving home 10 min later in manassas i parked and pulled out my phone to check flightaware.Com to check flight paths and any aircraft that might've traversed the airspace, taken off or landed at iad but only noted one departure of a business jet northbound from rwy 01c. i checked khef as well but no aircraft on ifr flight plans had operated from the field as well. this was peculiar given that the weather conditions were low visibility and overcast ceilings. prominent
content.summary: Low flying, slow, silent object with prominent red pulsating light.

content.detailedDescription:
“it was on or about feb.24, 2011, and i remember that particular day because it was very cold outside. the sky was clear that night which was nice after the bout of rain we had recently.The time was around 9:30-10:00 pm, and this is the time i take our three dogs outside to do their business as i try to stay warm and in a little bit of a hurry to get back inside where it’s warm. i noticed two of the dogs looking up, which normally they don’t, and i follow their gaze upward, and i notice through my neighbors trees at about 100 ft. above, three red lights blinking in order, vertically. the lights blink separately, yet as they blink there is a connective beam that weaves from one to the other(like a tesla light you see in those orbs when you touch it.) these lights are at about nw position, and moving to w. now, before it get’s very much further, the lights begin to rotate clockwise until they become horizontal. before it becomes fully horizontal, i can finally see a shape that i could’nt see before, and it is triangle-shaped and dull black in color. now, for this discripiton i have to let you know that there is a street light almost directly below this craft that is orange in color and is about 3 blocks away. at this distance, the object appears to be at least 35-40 feet long and 25 feet wide by 8-10 feet high. it has block shapes on top of it, and i can see 4-5 of these on top. at full horizontal, it is headed about west now, and though i can’t see the top of it anymore, i can still see the side of it. i can’t believe what i’m seeing, and i want to share this with someone before it goes away. so, i run to my son’s bedroom window (his corner bedroom windows faces nw & w) and i begin tapping on his window to get his attention and explain what i’ve been looking at. he looks and see’s what i see, and about this time my wife  comes outside to throw out the trash and notices me and my son. looking up and pointing to the sky. wife asks us what we are looking at, and she comes to the side of the house and see’s what we see , but by now it has moved from the west to heading south. it must have been moving slowly, because we could all still see the lights of it very clearly, and the time it took me to see it, go to my sons’s window, explain to him what i saw and show him, and have my wife come out and see it before it moved on must have taken some time. in my excitement, it seemed like it happened a little faster than that. oh, also, the third of our dogs, when this first happened, ran like crazy for the kitchen door, and i’ve never seen her run that fast!
 

 

 

  i don’t recall hearing any sound, as low to the ground as it was. i asked my son. & wife the same thing, in fact i recall asking them right after it happened, and we all agree that none of us recall hearing any sound. the time involved seemed longer than it was. my son. said it felt like 20 min, wife said 15-20 min, and i would have to say 15 min. however, the actual time that went by was in reality probably about 3-5 minutes. when i looked at the clock, i kept thinking, man this had to have been longer than 5 minutes! 

i didn’t feel any vibrations, but i do remember that it seemed like the air stood still.
content.summary: Triangular craft moving slowly with pulsating red lights moved in a counter clock wise path over my nieghborhood.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving into my gated apt complex, looked up and saw a chevron shaped formation. the lights, giving shape to the chevron were orange-red. the formation did not emit sound. as i continued to observe, 3-4 solid orange-red "orbs" followed the chevron- equidistantly spaced.
i started to record this event with my phone after a minute or so all of the lights disappeared.
content.summary: Entering my apt complex, i looked toward the sky and saw a chevron of lights that was moving slowly// uniformly.  i observed 3-4 orange/redl lights trailing the  craft

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home about 1pm and was driving past my favorite hill. it was not every day it had awesome cloud cover so, while driving, i took a couple pictures with my htc one phone. upon analysis, i saw a tiny speck in the clouds. so i cropped, and cropped until i could see the closeup that i sent as well. i can't figure out what it is. it looks like it's materializing, or the opposite in the cover 
of the clouds. i saw a ufo with a similar shape on tv once. but i don't have a clue i also took another picture about 4 miles up the same road on a different day. however, it was lost in a "crashed" phone. that's
content.summary: I was driving home and took pictures not seeing it originally. i zoomed in u have all photos including 1st.

content.detailedDescription:
I want to protect my sister these are her exact text words to me

it was on friday 23 of october at 5:45 in the morning.I was leaving for work when i decieded to go another route because of the train (train was coming at the cross road where she stopped )and i look to the left and i see two bright lights ( she said one was ontop of the other so there were two orbs ) that were the size of basketballs. it followed me while i was driving i thought it was an airplane but it wasnt.It made a loud noise ( she said it sounded like the wind blowing while driving in a car with the windows rolled up.) when she stoped at a stop light it stopped.And when i turned it still followed me until i turned on to another street i lost it.

she also witnessed the same ufo on mothers day night of 2015.
content.summary: While driving to work she said she was in allen county while waiting for a train to pass at anthony and creighton.

content.detailedDescription: I was just driving to the store and i observed a bright light.It looked like industrial light bulbs. i stopped and watched this craft stop mid flight.Which made me really know it wasn't from this planet.It flew without sound stopped flashed its lights 3-4 times and flashed and disappeared
content.summary: I observed it because it was so bright it moved 5-10 feet and stopped it's lights flashed about 4 times and it completely vanished no sounds or evidence it was still near

content.detailedDescription: I just returned from my work around 5 am ist time. decided to smoke after a hard day at work. while smoking i observed a bright object hovering above the moon and flashing lights. so i took a pic of it. it was havering around a min by the time i decided to take another snap i was gone. it was clear sky with no trails of cloud anywhere.
content.summary: Ufo like object hovering near the moon.

content.detailedDescription: It was december 18 1983 the nite after giving birth to my son. could not sleep. was looking outbthe hospital window saw what looked odd to me 2 moons one was about at 12 o,clock and the othwer was about at 2 o,clock but smaller and dimmer then he other one at the 12 o,clock possition
content.summary: Looks like 2 moons

content.detailedDescription: Leaving gatlinburg tenn. headed toward maryville tenn decided to take pics of mountain tops and noticed dark object over treeline. didnt really think about it.One hour later still going towards maryville i took another pic of treelines and same object was still in another photo. first observation i thought it was a helium baloon yet it never moved.Second photo object was much further away.Did not think much about pics until i looked more closely at them and realized its nothing ive ever seen before. the object faded away in distance.
content.summary: Observed  a triangle shape object in photos

content.detailedDescription: It was 1968, may about 10pm for about 5 min or less. the bright light from the space craft woke me. i got up and looked out the window. what i saw was a small craft dim in color their was a little enity looking at me not shore why but i waved nd it waved back. the craft was oval in shape with what looked like a window for the top.After i waved and it waved back it took off through the breezeway and made a sudden turn to the right.
content.summary: Woke me up little enity waved

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a cigarette when i noticed a few bright lights 2 where planes heading east and south but the other one was ne and it was going unbelievably fast i was watching it and tried to take video but my camera is rubbish i thought it was a fast plane until it was about 2 mile estimate on route with aeroplane that's when i thought that's not a plane it was going really fast looked like it noticed the plane light started dimming until nothing left after plane had passed approximately 30 secs the light started appearing again it was a brilliant white rather nice to look at then it shot up into the sky id never seen anything like that before and i do observe the sky often the objects was like a plane except it was brilliant white was going at really fast speeds and the sudden stop lights dimmed then shot upwards unbelievable
content.summary: Light speed through sky stopped and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out report with witness on the the phone at mufon hq, by field investigator, l. flechtner 18809 on 10/28/15
______________________________________________________________________
on tuesday october 27th, while taking pictures of the moon. witness saw an other object near the moon, it was purplish with a white center. it seemed half the size of the moon and moved with the moon. it moved away from the moon slowly. witness could not see this with his naked eye and saw it only in the pictures. he says the newspaper wants the picture, but he doesn't know how to down load it.Maybe fi can help him download picture.
content.summary: On tuesday october 27th, while taking pictures of the moon witness saw an other object near the moon, it was purplish with a white center

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
in car driving home from work, i was in passengers side.  

2. what made you first notice the object?

object flashed with light. 

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
most likely an airplane, planes are common around here. 
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.

for the duration of the observation the object just hung in the air flashing a white light, apart from this flashing it did not move in anyway.  

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after 
sighting the object.

minimal, as airplanes are common, it is also common to see lights in the sky, but i do think it was odd that this object did not move at all. 

6. how did you lose sight of the object?

we continued to drive home thus loosing sight of the object.
content.summary: Flashing light in the sky, did not move.

content.detailedDescription: On 10/26/2015, i was helping a friend change the battery in his car. at about 6 my friend and i noticed the sun shinny through the clouds but the beam was focused, like a magnifying glass would do with the sun. we both took a few picture and went on with our day. later the evening when i was at the dinner table with family i pulled out my phone to show them how cool the sun looked. that is when one of us noticed the round object in both pics.
content.summary: I was taking a picture of the sun shining through the clouds almost like a magnifying glass would do. later after showing friends of the pic we noticed the round object.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking inside my house, i shut the front door and looked out the window, like i do every time, and i saw this really bright star. i looked at for a second, and then thought to myself 'it's just an airplane', and then it moved to the right a little bit, in a really weird way that didn't look like anything i've ever seen before. i opened the door and stepped outside to watch it, and it wasn't moving any closer or further away, it just hovered there in the sky, flashing. again i thought it was an airplane and i was just tired, but the lights looked different, and there were colors flashing that i'd never seen on any plane before. i sat down and just watched it, afraid to move because i might miss something. it hovered, and it would jump to the right, then to the left, and then it would go up and to the right, and i could swear even though i couldn't make out a definite shape that it was tilting at an angle. i stared and stared, and even walked down the street for a clearer view, just to be sure that it was moving, and not the trees in my yard blowing in the wind. it was definitely moving. when it hovered, it didn't sit perfectly still, it sort of wavered, like a quadrotor drone. so then i thought maybe it was a personal drone someone was flying, but i watched and watched and it stayed up there, and as far as i know, the battery life on those personal drones isn't very long. i sat outside watching it for 30 minutes, and then it looked like it was ejecting things from it, like tiny shooting stars. i thought maybe my eyes were playing tricks on me, and i was seeing some kind of glare that looked like things were coming out of it, but then one came out and made a big curve over the thing. it came out of what i can only assume was the top, went up and to the left, and then made a big arcing curve over the light, or craft, or whatever it was. they weren't bright like the thing itself, they had really faint tails as they came off. i've seen a few ufos in the last year or two, but this one is the only one i've been able to actually watch, instead of just seeing. the last one i saw there was a witness. the night of the lunar eclipse a few weeks ago we saw a blue light flying in a straight path, but it looked smoother than an airplane and it was just a solid blue light. it stopped mid flight, turned from blue to red, and then dropped straight down and we lost sight of it. there were at least 50 people outside looking at the eclipse, i know somebody else saw that.
content.summary: Multicolored flashing lights, brighter than any star, hovered around and jumped in different directions, ascended slowly, descended, watched for 45 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
I walked up the steps and for some unknowing reason look over my right shoulder and observed a craft floating above the building across the street.
there was no sound but i noticed movement  through porthole type and rectagular windows it moved  very slowly past us. many years later i found out other siblings had also had the same experience at the same time, but never mentioned it. this was the beginning of several episodes that i have never been able to fully understand.
content.summary: Holiday visit looked over rt shoulder saw craft moving slowly  above apt across the street.

content.detailedDescription: i am a partially paralyzed individual that felt a very strong urge to walk into my backyard and look towards the ne horizon. upon seeing this object i at first felt it was a star hey an overwhelming sense of warmth and immense compassion overcame me. then walking back to get my phone or camera looking over my shoulder to the east noticed blue & purple pulsing lights. upon adjusting my focus for my camera it again appeared starlike as i took the image. this is the original caption, i took 3 however this image was the best representation of its structure per say.
content.summary: Was pulled energetically into my backyard and looked right at it instantly with an overwhelming sense of warmth and compassion to see a starlike pulsing orb.

content.detailedDescription:
Stationary light was seen north of sterling va close to dulles airport, light pulsates many different colors, it blinks out for a few min then returns at the same location or at a nearby location.  sightings are on going please contact me for further information such as pictures reporting information and video. 
also others in our area have submitted reports to the national ufo reporting center with similar discriptions.
content.summary: Stationary pulsating light near dulles airport.

content.detailedDescription: We have seen these fire ball orbs twice , both times in october. we live in a condo on the beach in provincetown. last time they looked like they may have co.E out of water or other side of sand castle motell . they went up one at a time made a hexagon shape then zipped off one at a time and disappeared at the same point kinda direction the sun sets here . this time we saw at least 4 over the town airplanes following but when airplanes got close they would blink then be somewhere else. this time made a formation of 4 in a row then   zipped off. this time only me and my boyfriend saw them last october. us my 21 year old daughter and 2 neighbors
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: We live in a condo on the beach , have seen twice , both october. looked like drones made of balls of fire . they lined up 4 in a row at some point . last time made a hexigon. shape

content.detailedDescription: Before you read: yes i am crazy! ok got that out the way. i spend alot of time on my roof. i stay away from people, so they are what i have. i was on my roof as always and decided today im gonna see if i can catch one of them in a picture. i can see the ships with my bare eyes thanks to their gift.But cameras have s hard time picking them up unless the sun assists you. cause it disrupts their cloaking shield. it has a life of it's own it seems. it's made of the same plasma as the sun, so it bends light rendering it invisible pretty much except when thr chem trails are sprayed..They use whatever chemicals to mimic clouds and blend in..And there are more than ships floating around. thats all the do, float and watch us. their fleet makes very little sound if any, just s low hum. sometimes it sound like rumbling from afar but you can't ever see a jet ar airplane..And thats another thing zive noticed.When there ate alot of them, the planes stop. and i live a ways away from the base. so i know the difference between aircraft used by homosapien, and what isn't. you need you remember they are way more advanced than you can ever be. so their laws of physics and gravity don't apply to them. because they choose not to. if you weren't taught, to know you limits, anything is possible.They could have taken us out anytime they wanted.But they are waiting..They hsve been for a long time. these are just some pics. if you would like zi could show you how they hide in plain sight. its actually leaves me in awe evertime a huge one mimic the stars at night..The stars look distorted..Gor a dot anyways!! lol
content.summary: I was on my roof watching the sunset.I always see them but that day i got my note4 so i tried it and caught them this time.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down boulder highway going north.  i had just left the joker's wild casino.  i first noticed the object to my left which would be to the west.  it was a full moon out the sky was well lit and las vegas and the strip was to the west/north-west.  i first noticed the object by light and movement.  when i turned  my head to view the object there was no hesitation, no doubt in my mind what it was. it was clearly a outlined triangular craft, the lights of the craft and of the night sky gave it some depth as to its size and shape. it was not in any holding pattern or approach pattern to mccarran international airport, which i am very familiar with. along with my initial viewing of it and automatically able to identify it as being a triangular craft that was not an airplane.  i got the automatic impression that it was military or part of the ssp(secret space program).  it seemed to be in cruise mode and flying just as fast as any regular airplane could. it did not hover or zoom away it flew at nearly a constant rate of speed.  which was fast enough to get out of my range of view after 20-30 seconds of viewing it.  there was no power up or signs of power except for the illumination of the lights on the corners of the "object" and underneath it.  upon first seeing it i saw solid white lights on the corners of the craft.  they did not change colors nor did they blink/flashed/pulsed.  along with that there also was a red light on the underneath of the craft, just slightly off center, almost dead center but not quite.  this red  light how ever did flash/blinked on and off.   i was very excited upon seeing the object because i have seen  many things before but nothing so close and with such distinction.  i was following a friend of mine and i was flashing my lights at him, he didn't slow down so i called him and he could not locate it and it was quickly getting out of view.  after driving north on boulder highway i lost it as i was turning left, west bound on sunset rd.  i lost it off in the distance, which was to the north west.  if i had to guess at the size of the object it was definitely bigger than any standard jumbo jet.  at the distance and speed it was traveling i'd say at least two jumbo jets in width, perhaps bigger but definitely not smaller.
content.summary: Triangular craft sited on boulder highway just south of sunset rd. near joker's wild

content.detailedDescription: During the first game of the workd series, i walked out side for a quick smoke.  looking west at 7:52pm, i saw a very unusual sight.  i saw numerous flashing red lights covering an area about 3 inches by 2 inches at arms length.  these were not lanti collision lights on a plane, but we're blinking faster and in various locations within within 3 by 2 inch area at arms length.  it seemed like i should see a craft, but i did not.  the radom cluster of red lights moved ne and i lost track of it due north.  i first observed it at about 45 degrees almost due west of me and lost sight of it at about 30 degrees about due north.  it seemed very low.  i live close to the san diego airport, so am very used to planes, various military aircraft and of course blimps.  this cluster of lights seemed like it may be associated with a large craft, but i could not see a craft, just the blinking lights.  this cluster of lights was silent. it should have been very loud, but it was silent.  at any one moment i could see 5 randomly flashing lights, sometimes 6 or 7 lights.
content.summary: Large scatter of rapidly, but random, flashing red lights in an area about the size of a small blimp

content.detailedDescription: Son and i do karate boot camp we were walking to car wanted to show son the 3 planets were aleigned this week so i was looking for those planets. then right above us and slowly moving past heading west . ran back to karate class and had others come out and look. it covered the sky, 3 red flashing lights behind it , very low, full moon so u could see the shape somewhat. shook me up all night and i don't believe n ufo. when lights flashed u could see the rounded bk gray steel surface. n my pic u see green doom on top of ship. video would not capture it . pic did. i am still n disbelief of this sighting . next day say increase n military planes flying but don't know if it's just a coencidence. neighbor is traffic controller he said nothing on radar but would check again.
content.summary: Hugh nothing i've seen . maybe stealth bomber but moved so slow

content.detailedDescription: my oldes son and i were star watching at my house in north texas we see a lot of weird stuff in the sky out here at night well in march of 2014 we saw an object appear right above us around 100 to 500 ft instantly it was there just showed up not a sound it was. huge about raise of a track at a high school then it opened up a wedge like a pizza slice bright as day then instantly it went south maybe 1/4 mile then opened up again then it was gone never seen anything like that before or sence
content.summary: Round black  hovering above  us the like a pizza slice it opened up then mover south and stopped then open up again then it was gone 5 -8 seconds  total time

content.detailedDescription: At approx 3:15 am thursday september 24th 2015 i was leaving my garage and i saw 3 separate pairs of 3 lights flashing lights. i thought the objects were drones. i have video of one of the sets of lights. it had varied speeds slowing down and speeding up. it crossed the sky in a curved / wavy pattern. i did not feel any different than usual. i lost sight of 2 of the objects while recording the 3rd object that left my view behind some trees.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 different pairs of flashing lights lasted around 5-10 minutes
